h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
content: The important thing to remember for this second phase is that the attacks he performs don't really change from the first phase. He just replaces the rocks with fire and ice. But the trickiest part of the fight is how quickly and often he switches between the use of frost of fire.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone' and the sub-subsection 'Stone Monkey Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
The important thing to remember for this second phase is that the attacks he performs don't really change from the first phase. He just replaces the rocks with fire and ice. But the trickiest part of the fight is how quickly and often he switches between the use of frost of fire.
